description.value: The dragon can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. In addition, difficult terrain composed of ice or snow doesn’t cost it extra movement.
If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] fails a save, it can choose to succeed instead.

When the white dragon hasn’t unleashed its Cold Breath, the cold builds up within it and ripples outward from it. While the dragon’s Cold Breath is available, it emits a numbing chill, and each creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the dragon must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or its speed is halved.
The dragon uses its Frightful Presence. It then makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.
Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]], reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.
Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]], reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.
Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]], reach 20 ft., one creature. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

Every creature of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s choice within 120 ft. of it must succeed on a [[/save]] save or become &Reference[frightened]{frightened} of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect for itself on a success. If a creature’s save succeeds or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

The dragon exhales an icy blast in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] automatically detects every creature and trap within 30 feet of it, pinpointing the current location of each.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] roars at up to two creatures of its choice within 120 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a [[/save]] save or be vulnerable to cold damage until the end of its next turn. A target resistant to cold damage isn’t resistant to it for the duration. A target immune to cold damage is still immune to it, even if the target fails the save.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save]] save or take [[/damage average]] damage and be knocked &Reference[prone]{prone}. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can then fly up to half its flying speed without provoking opportunity attacks.
